ACCOUNT_ID.NOTE: This ID is required if you are building an API based integration
ACCOUNT_ID.TITLE: Account ID

AUTO_RESOLVE_DURATION.ERROR: Please enter a valid auto resolve duration (minimum 1 day and maximum 999 days)

FEATURES.CUSTOM_EMAIL_DOMAIN_ENABLED: 您现在可以在您的自定义域名的电子邮件中接收消息。
FEATURES.INBOUND_EMAIL_ENABLED: 您的帐户启用了与电子邮件的对话连续性。
